resources.string: You lost :( But it\'s OK because failure is necessary to grow :) Levels completed:
You, my friends, have equally bad memories. Congrats! Levels completed:
Congrats, it\'s a tie! You both completed all of the levels, so go settle this with rock paper scissors.
Player one, congrats! You beat player two and can rub this in their face for the rest of time.
Player two, congrats! You beat player one and can rub this in their face for the rest of time.
